scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://34.87.64.105:8000/ --ipfs http://34.87.64.105:5001 v2-core-subgraph --network localhost
scripts.deploy-sonic: graph deploy --node http://34.87.64.105:8000/ --ipfs http://34.87.64.105:5001 v2-core-subgraph --network sonic-testnet
scripts.deploy-sonic-alchemy: graph deploy sonic-testnet --version-label v0.0.1 --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key %DEPLOY_KEY% --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz --network sonic-testnet
scripts.deploy-arbitrum: dotenv -e .env -- cross-var graph deploy v2-core-subgraph --version-label %DEPLOY_VERSION% --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key %DEPLOY_KEY% --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz --network arbitrum-sepolia
scripts.deploy-base: dotenv -e .env -- cross-var graph deploy v2-core-subgraph-base --version-label %DEPLOY_VERSION% --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key %DEPLOY_KEY% --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz --network base
scripts.deploy-berachain-bartio: graph build --network=berachain-bartio && dotenv -e .env -- cross-var goldsky subgraph deploy v2-core-subgraph-berachain-bartio/%DEPLOY_VERSION% --path .
scripts.deploy-zksync-era: graph build --network=zksync-era && dotenv -e .env -- cross-var goldsky subgraph deploy v2-core-subgraph-zksync-era/%DEPLOY_VERSION% --path .
scripts.deploy-zksync-era-sepolia: graph build --network=zksync-era-sepolia && dotenv -e .env -- cross-var goldsky subgraph deploy v2-core-subgraph-zksync-era-sepolia/%DEPLOY_VERSION% --path .
